item.title: August 2023 Presentations
item.description: I will be presenting results from the project at MSRG in a few upcoming events. Data Sciences Institute Research Day - August 10th Format: Poster Location: Room 17020, 700 University Avenue, 17th Floor Undergraduate Engineering Research Day - August 16th Format: Podium Location: Myhal Centre website
